revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Token | name = Stamina upgrade | class = UpgradeStamina | game = Strife | convid = 306, 287, 307 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→[[Classes:DummyStrifeItem|DummyStrifeItem]]→UpgradeStamina
An inventory item. When used, this increases the player's max health by 10 (up to 200), increases the damage of the [[Classes:PunchDagger|Punch Dagger]], and fully heals you to boot! By inheriting this item, you can make health powerups that increase the player's max health. See [[Creating health items that increase the player's maximum health|this]] article for more information. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR UpgradeStamina : {{Class|DummyStrifeItem}} native { {{Property|Inventory.Amount}} 10 {{Property|Inventory.MaxAmount}} 100 }
